# Discretas

## Generacion de Binomial (100)

# Variando p = 0.30

```{r}
n1 <- 100
k <- 25
p <- 0.3
```

```{r}
mibinomial_p3_100 <- rbinom(n1,k,p)
```

```{r}
plot(mibinomial_p3_100,col="blue",
     main = "100 VA Binom(k,p)",
     xlab="Num de VA",
     ylab = "Binom(25,p)")
```

```{r}
hist(mibinomial_p3_100, main="Histograma 100 VA Binom(k,p))",
     col = "lightgreen",
     xlab = "VA generadas",
     ylab = "Binom(25,p)")
```

# Comparacion de graficos 

## Comparando *plot* de 100

```{r}
par(mfrow = c(2,2))
plot(mibinomial_p3_100,col="blue",
     main = "100 VA Binom(k,p)",
     xlab="Num de VA",
     ylab = "Binom(25,0.30)")
plot(mibinomial_p45_100,col="blue",
     main = "100 VA Binom(k,p)",
     xlab="Num de VA",
     ylab = "Binom(25,0.45)")
plot(mibinomial_p8_100,col="blue",
     main = "100 VA Binom(k,p)",
     xlab="Num de VA",
     ylab = "Binom(25,0.80)")
plot(mibinomial_p96_100,col="blue",
     main = "100 VA Binom(k,p)",
     xlab="Num de VA",
     ylab = "Binom(25,0.96)")
```

     xlab="Num de VA",
     ylab = "Binom(10,0.5)")

     col = "lightgreen",

# En conclusi√≥n

**m** Cu√°ntas veces repetimos el experimento completo
**k** Cu√°ntas veces se repite el evento individual en CADA experimento
**p** La probabilidad de que ocurra el evento en cada ensayo individual
